author: Emma Roth
title: Apple’s 5th Ave store spray-painted to protest ‘climate hypocrisy’
description: A climate change activist was arrested after spray-painting Apple’s 5th Avenue store as part of a protest against Big Tech’s “climate hypocrisy.” Protestors from the Extinction Rebellion environmental group staged a demonstration at the New York City storefro…
content:
An Extinction Rebellion protester was arrested after spray-painting Tim + Trump = Toxic on Apples New York City storefront.
A climate change activist was arrested after spray-painting Apples 5th Ave… [+2207 chars]
